document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Rose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">caper </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">cheek </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Boddice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">rose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">fell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">pretty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">speech </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">drunken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">stagger </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">pitiful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">fingers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">fumbled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">work </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">needle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">ailed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">smart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">maid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">puzzled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">opposite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">spied </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">cheek </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">bore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">another </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Rose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">opposite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">another </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">speech </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Drunkard </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">goes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Vest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Boddice, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">danced </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">immortal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">tune </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">two </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">troubled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Clocks </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Ticked </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">softly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">into </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The rose did caper on her cheek
